docs.snippet: The Massenet revival continues apace, with the Friends of French Opera bringing a concert version of "Sapho" to Carnegie Hall on Tuesday. By coincidence it is not the only "Sapho" around. On Feb. 3 and 4, in CAMI Hall, a group known as Apollo  Ope...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Massenet revival continues apace, with the Friends of French Opera bringing a concert version of "Sapho" to Carnegie Hall on Tuesday. By coincidence it is not the only "Sapho" around. On Feb. 3 and 4, in CAMI Hall, a group known as Apollo Opera is staging the American premiere of Gounod's "Sapho." But the two operas have nothing in common.

headline.main: MUSIC VIEW; The Return Of 'Sapho' MUSIC VIEW The Revival of Massenet's 'Sapho'

docs.abstract: Publicists at Columbia Pictures, in effort to promote film Fast Break, about basketball coach who brings team of black ghetto athletes from Bklyn to small Nev univ, decide to legitimize mythical coll, Cadwallader Univ; announcement is sent to newspapers across US that univ was conferring hon decrees on various notables; was mailed from a real locale, Bunkerville, Nev; Columbia beseiged with calls for application forms (M)
